review: So umm...I've only had my kick start for a month and now I'm waiting for my replacement to be sent...I'm annoyed really!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Very high quality at an unbeliveable price. So far everything about this stick is perfect.
author: ROY H.

review: Absolutely love it. Easy to install and work.  I used to stream nextflix through my bluray and has lots of issues with it having to buffer constantly.  With the fire stick,  I have no trouble streaming at all. Prime benefits are also awesome! Huge fan of this product.
author: Elizabeth Durham

review: Works great and streams without any lags
author: LGR

review: Excellent gadget , maybe need more apps aviable and Multilanguage support
author: CyberNick

review: Does the same job as the Fire TV box for what I need...
author: goblue

review: Love this! But currently I notice that there are times when programs get short pauses. Not sure if it's the stick malfunctioning or if my wireless connection is not strong enough... As far as ease of use, definitely exceeds expectations. Barely any steps to set up and was starting to watch my programs within 5 minutes.
author: chingu

review: Works like promised. Easy to use.
author: Victor Rhoder
